attributes.action: call a referendum on proportional representation promised in the 1997 general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The referendum was part of Tony Blairs 1997 general election and even with the overwhelming labour majority the referendum has not been called for 11 years now and is one of many things the government chooses to forget mainly because they wouldn't stand a chance if there was a P.R. system that would encourage real people to rule themselves
